precondition: The Windows XP desktop is visible.
action: Right Click on the desktop background.
expected_results: A context menu will appear with options such as "Arrange Icons By," "Refresh," "Paste," "New," and "Properties."

precondition: The desktop context menu is visible.
The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is active.
action: Click the "Screen Saver" dropdown menu and select "None".
expected_results: The "Screen Saver" dropdown menu will display "None" as the selected option.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open, and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected.
action: Click the dropdown button labeled 'Screen saver'. Then, click the 'None' option in the opened list.
expected_results: The 'Screen saver' dropdown menu will display 'None' as the selected option.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open, showing the 'Screen Saver' tab. The 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu should display 'None' as the selected option.
action: Click the 'Power...' button located to the right of the 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' window will open.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is active. The "Power..." button is visible within the "Monitor power" section.
action: Click the "Power..." button in the "Monitor power" section.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will open in front of the "Display Properties" window.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open with the "Power Schemes" tab selected. The "Turn off monitor" option should be visible with a dropdown menu displaying "After 20 mins".
action: Click the dropdown button next to the "Turn off monitor" setting.
expected_results: The dropdown menu will expand, displaying a list of time options for the "Turn off monitor" setting.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open with the "Power Schemes" tab selected. The "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu should be accessible and visible within this tab.
action: Click the "Never" option within the "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Never" option will become highlighted, indicating that the monitor will no longer automatically turn off.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open with the "Power Schemes" tab selected. The "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu within the "Settings for Home/Office Desk power scheme" section should display "Never."
action: Click the "OK" button at the bottom of the window.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will close. The changes to the power scheme, including setting the monitor to never turn off, will be applied.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is active. The mouse cursor is hovering over the 'OK' button.
